user.title: Set up Multizone Heater
user.description: Configure the main climate entity and aggregation settings.

add_zone.title: Add Heating Zone
add_zone.description: Add a heating zone. Provide either a zone climate entity OR a temperature sensor (or both). If using valves, BOTH physical valve and virtual switch are required.

data.valve_switch: Physical Valve Switch (required if using virtual switch)
data.virtual_switch: Virtual Switch (required if using physical valve)

fallback_zones.title: Select Fallback Zones
fallback_zones.description: Select at least one zone to keep open when all zones are satisfied or during cooling mode. This ensures pump safety and system stability.

error.no_zones: At least one zone must be configured.
error.need_temp_source: Provide at least one temperature source (zone climate or temperature sensor).
error.need_virtual_switch: Physical valve requires a virtual switch (virtual switch pattern).
error.need_physical_valve: Virtual switch requires a physical valve (virtual switch pattern).
error.duplicate_entity: This entity is already used in another zone.
error.need_fallback: At least one fallback zone must be selected for pump safety.
error.invalid_temp_range: Main minimum temperature must be less than main maximum temperature.

init.title: Multizone Heater Options
init.description: Configure options for the multizone heater.
